resources.string:
1 tube (13.8 ounces) refrigerated pizza crust
2 tablespoons olive oil, divided
6 large eggs
2 tablespoons water
1 package (3 ounces) bacon bits
1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese

1. Preheat oven to 400°. Unroll and press dough onto bottom and 1/2 in. up sides of a greased 15x10x1-in. pan.
 Prick thoroughly with a fork; brush with 1 tablespoon oil.
 Bake until lightly browned, 7-8 minutes

2. Meanwhile, whisk together eggs and water. In a nonstick skillet, heat remaining oil over medium heat.
 Add eggs; cook and stir just until thickened and no liquid egg
 remains. Spoon over crust. Sprinkle with bacon bits and cheese.

 3. Bake until cheese is melted, 5-7 minutes.
